titles.title: Retirement Account Portability Improvement Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase portability among retirement plans.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Ways and Means
Referred to House Education and the Workforce
Referred to the Subcommittee on Employer-Employee Relations.

bill.summary: 1/31/2003--Introduced. Retirement Account Portability Improvement Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase portability among retirement plans by, among other things: (1) increasing rollover opportunities; (2) providing for faster vesting of employer nonelective contributions; and (3) elimination of the higher penalty on certain SIMPLE distributions.
